content.rendered:
The statute contains the main norms that regulate the activity of the institution, such as: the organization, activity and work of constituent structures, authorities and governing bodies, their election or appointment, ensuring the creation of a simulating and necessary climate for consultation and decision-making on academic matters, between teachers and students, especially student-centered, levels of delegation of authority from governing and management bodies, quality assurance mechanisms, funding sources and modalities, periods of internal evaluation of structures and study programs, the rights and obligations of academic and non-academic staff and students, as well as other duties governing the activities of the Tempulli.

Statute

excerpt.rendered: Statuti përmban normat kryesore që rregullojnë veprimtarinë e institucionit, siq janë : organizimi, veprimtaria dhe puna e strukturave përbërëse, autoriteteve dhe organeve drejtuese, zgjedhja ose emërimi i tyre, krijimin e simulimeve të nevojshme për konsultim dhe vendim, përbërjen e qështjeve akademike ndërmjet mësuesëve dhe studentëve veqanarishtë studentëve në qendër, niveleve të delegimit të autoriteteve nga […]
